article_title: How to Stay Fit While Social Distancing
article_description: The gyms are closed  The snacks are now always within reach  Venturing outdoors is recommended  so long as you maintain six feet of distance between you and other humans  But if you ve tried running at a park recently  there are a whole lot of people who clea
